Name: Amulet of Time: Shadow of La Rochelle
About the game: When the ghost of the beautiful Diane de Poitiers appears in front of you, you are transported back in time in 'Amulet of Time: Shadow of la Rochelle'! Make a trip back in time to the middle of the 16th century to explore France and an incredible love story in this amazing Hidden Object Adventure game.
